title: Ukraine’s European allies eye once-taboo ‘land-for-peace’ negotiations
content: European allies are increasingly bracing for negotiations on Russia’s war in Ukraine that could include territorial concessions in return for security guarantees for Kyiv.
summary: European allies are increasingly bracing for negotiations on Russia’s war in Ukraine that could include territorial concessions in return for security guarantees for Kyiv.

title: Trump appointees signal a new hawkish China policy
content: Trump’s potential appointees Marco Rubio, Mike Waltz and Elise Stefanik at State Department, National Security Council and United Nations signal a hawkish China policy.
summary: Trump’s potential appointees Marco Rubio, Mike Waltz and Elise Stefanik at State Department, National Security Council and United Nations signal a hawkish China policy.

title: Blinken helms last-minute rush of support to Ukraine before Trump takes office
content: Trump has vowed to put a quick end to Russia’s war on Ukraine, which Kyiv and some European capitals believe could force Ukraine to make painful concessions.
summary: Trump has vowed to put a quick end to Russia’s war on Ukraine, which Kyiv and some European capitals believe could force Ukraine to make painful concessions.

title: Live Briefing: IDF strikes Beirut’s southern suburbs; Israeli ministers welcome Trump Cabinet picks
content: The Israel Defense Forces said it struck facilities used by Hezbollah for military purposes after the group fired more rockets across the Lebanese border.
summary: The Israel Defense Forces said it struck facilities used by Hezbollah for military purposes after the group fired more rockets across the Lebanese border.

title: Blinken says Israel did not fully address U.S. concerns over Gaza
Israeli forces target Beirut suburb, issue evacuation warnings
Far-right Israeli leaders welcome Trump’s latest picks for administration
U.S. says no policy consequences for Israel despite lack of Gaza aid
35 people killed in China after man rams car into crowd
content: Amid shock at the high death toll, officials have tried to soothe public anger with a flurry of promises to serve justice and do better to prevent future attacks.
summary: Amid shock at the high death toll, officials have tried to soothe public anger with a flurry of promises to serve justice and do better to prevent future attacks.

title: What Trump’s emerging foreign policy team tells us about his agenda
content: In picking figures such as Marco Rubio and Fox News host Pete Hegseth for his administration, Trump may be signaling his foreign policy goals — or foreshadowing four years of chaos.
summary: In picking figures such as Marco Rubio and Fox News host Pete Hegseth for his administration, Trump may be signaling his foreign policy goals — or foreshadowing four years of chaos.

title: U.S. won’t withhold aid to Israel, walking back threat over conditions in Gaza
content: The United States will not withhold military aid from Israel, the State Department said Tuesday, despite the situation in Gaza not improving, according to aid groups and U.N. officials.
summary: The United States will not withhold military aid from Israel, the State Department said Tuesday, despite the situation in Gaza not improving, according to aid groups and U.N. officials.

title: U.S. says no policy consequences for Israel despite lack of Gaza aid
content: A Post analysis based on more than a dozen interviews found Israel has largely failed to comply with U.S. demands, bringing parts of northern Gaza closer to famine.
summary: A Post analysis based on more than a dozen interviews found Israel has largely failed to comply with U.S. demands, bringing parts of northern Gaza closer to famine.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury resigns over mishandling of abuse allegations
content: A report found Justin Welby took insufficient action on allegations against John Smyth, believed to be “the most prolific serial abuser” associated with the Church of England.
summary: A report found Justin Welby took insufficient action on allegations against John Smyth, believed to be “the most prolific serial abuser” associated with the Church of England.

title: South Korean president refreshes golf skills after years to prep for Trump
content: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol is preparing for the return of golf diplomacy under President-elect Donald Trump.
summary: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol is preparing for the return of golf diplomacy under President-elect Donald Trump.

title: Far-right Israeli minister welcomes Mike Huckabee as Trump pick for ambassador
U.S. won’t withhold military aid from Israel as deadline for Gaza aid surge passes
Emperor penguin found on Australian beach, thousands of miles from home
content: The emperor penguin was found on an Australian beach near the coastal town of Denmark, more than 2,200 miles from its Antarctic habitat.
summary: The emperor penguin was found on an Australian beach near the coastal town of Denmark, more than 2,200 miles from its Antarctic habitat.

title: Germany set for early elections in February after government collapse
content: The decision follows a budget fight that prompted Chancellor Olaf Scholz to fire his finance minister and announce a confidence vote that is widely expected to fail.
summary: The decision follows a budget fight that prompted Chancellor Olaf Scholz to fire his finance minister and announce a confidence vote that is widely expected to fail.

title: The U.S. demanded that Israel surge aid to Gaza. Little has changed.
Food delivery to northern Gaza reduced and delayed, U.N. agency says
As Trump prepares for mass deportations, Mexico is not ready
content: Mexicans make up half of immigrants living illegally in the U.S. The country could be the most vulnerable to a new Trump policy to deport the undocumented.
summary: Mexicans make up half of immigrants living illegally in the U.S. The country could be the most vulnerable to a new Trump policy to deport the undocumented.

title: Saudi crown prince accuses Israel of committing genocide
With new stealth fighter, China displays ambitions to challenge U.S.
content: China debuted the J-35A jet at an airshow that was attended by a senior Russian national security official, underlining Beijing’s ever-closer bonds with Moscow.
summary: China debuted the J-35A jet at an airshow that was attended by a senior Russian national security official, underlining Beijing’s ever-closer bonds with Moscow.

title: New Zealand government apologizes for ‘horrific’ abuse in state care
content: Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said sorry to some 200,000 survivors of physical and sexual abuse in institutions, which an inquiry called a “national disgrace.”
summary: Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said sorry to some 200,000 survivors of physical and sexual abuse in institutions, which an inquiry called a “national disgrace.”

title: With Trump win, Israeli minister calls to annex parts of West Bank
Gunfire closes Haiti’s main airport as new prime minister is sworn in
content: A council tasked with restoring order to the nation said it was replacing Prime Minister Garry Conille with businessman Alix Didier Fils-Aimé.
summary: A council tasked with restoring order to the nation said it was replacing Prime Minister Garry Conille with businessman Alix Didier Fils-Aimé.

title: Trump is planning a border crackdown. Biden already started one.
content: Donald Trump has pledged to quickly subdue migrant crossings at the southern border by restoring the policies of his first term, including “Remain in Mexico.”
summary: Donald Trump has pledged to quickly subdue migrant crossings at the southern border by restoring the policies of his first term, including “Remain in Mexico.”

title: What Trump's win means for the rest of the world
content: On today’s “Post Reports,” how foreign leaders are reacting to Trump’s victory, and how they are preparing for a second Trump presidency.
summary: On today’s “Post Reports,” how foreign leaders are reacting to Trump’s victory, and how they are preparing for a second Trump presidency.

title: With Trump win, Israeli minister calls to annex parts of West Bank
content: Comments Monday by Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich were the strongest display yet of how Trump’s election has emboldened Israeli hard-liners.
summary: Comments Monday by Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich were the strongest display yet of how Trump’s election has emboldened Israeli hard-liners.

title: Majority of Gaza aid missions in October were denied or impeded by Israel, U.N. says
Trump win means ‘time has come’ to annex parts of West Bank, Israeli minister says
content: Israel’s fight against Hamas in Gaza and Hezbollah in Lebanon is set to dominate the agenda at gatherings in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and the White House this week.
summary: Israel’s fight against Hamas in Gaza and Hezbollah in Lebanon is set to dominate the agenda at gatherings in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and the White House this week.
